page.title: 17Place Names
page.content: On our map there are some interesting place names.We have painted pictures of them.We believe the names are ancient and have these meanings. {Beacon Hill-}site of a warning beacon {The Great Road-}old coach road on hill {Bicknoller Post- }place where horses were changed over {Longstone Hill- }long ridge hill {Hodders Combe-}peaceful valley {Holford Combe- }crossing in the valley {Halsway- }the hazel pathway {Hare Knapp-}hilltop where hares are found {Willoughby Cleeve- }willow cliff {Thorncombe- }valley of thorns {Frog Combe,Frog Wood,Frog Hill-}places where many frogs are found {Ladys Fountain- }a spring,{Ladys Edge side of combe {Lady probably refers to {Our Lady
